##The hard side of billions of dollars: counterfeit airline fraud, face masks temporary breach of contract price increase

Micro signal

Function introduction, the official account of tecent science and technology of tecent news banner, read technology here!

Source: tencent news'periscope'column

By Zhang Jun.

From the cities such as Beijing, Guangzhou and Shenzhen to raise funds to masks, protective clothing issued to doctors and nurses, need to experience how much difficulty?

COVID-19 began sweeping China in early January, with business companies, foundations, the general public, and overseas Chinese students donating at an unprecedented rate. Including corporate fund-raising, public welfare funds to the public fund-raising, the amount of at least billions of dollars. On the other hand, the voice from Wuhan Hospital in Hubei Constantly reminds us of the shortage of materials. Video from Wuhan Hospital shows doctors at several hospitals not drinking water for a day in order to save disposable protective clothing, face masks have been in short supply, and even doctors and nurses have simple instant noodles and biscuits for lunch on New Year's Eve.

On the one hand is the momentum of the chi-aid action, on the other hand is the urgent medical supplies in Wuhan and even Hubei, where does this contrast come from? Many people interviewed said that money is not a problem now, but to get supplies, to send supplies to the front is full of twists and turns.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
Late at night, I find myself in the presence of a liar

"cheaters are even more professional than we are, with all the stamps and signatures, " said a charity foundation secretary-general. He was available for an interview on January 26,2020, at 9:30 pm, Gasp. At this time COVID-19 public opinion fermenting 5 days, the Public Welfare Organization staff is almost busy working around the clock.

"The night of the Spring Festival gala was the craziest night for donations, with all the channels raising donations at an exponential rate, " said a project leader of an online fundraising platform. Online donations alone have reached at least 1 billion in recent days, a historical rarity. Public donations from businesses, such as Internet companies alone, exceed 2.5 billion yuan. "You see, it's only been a few days, and it's pretty scary. "

Their platform had dozens of users donating every second until two or three in the morning. According to his introduction, the total amount of donations raised by Internet charities in 2018 was around 3.2 billion, while donations for natural disasters in general were in the hundreds to tens of millions. By contrast, the amount of donations raised this time is huge and still increasing, and many people asked on the platform, this project is fully subscribed. Are there any other projects available for donation.

On the one hand, there are the donors, and on the other hand, after the fundraising platform has raised money, the money goes directly to the foundations, and the foundations do the execution. The first task of the foundation is to maximize the use of this money to purchase supplies and transport them to the front of the epidemic area. Among them, procurement and transportation are key points. There's no shortage of money. What's really scarce is supplies. "procurement is a Eight Immortals, " the person said.

The general secretary of the Public Welfare Foundation Top 15 groups of material procurement suppliers in Wechat, three days in a row in the scramble for supplies, price bombing spent. After hanging up, his cell phone showed hundreds of unread reminders, working until after 2 a.m. every day. He didn't realize he was about to lose $560,000.

The fraud trail looks pretty wild. On January 25th the foundation was approached by an airline asset manager who claimed to have a stockpile of nearly 200,000 N95 masks -- 120,000 to donate and 70,000 to buy, however, it indicated that it was a "half-price sale" at the winning bid price. A series of seemingly legitimate airline documents was provided.

Description of goods and materials for sale provided by the fraudster for photo / interview with the Public Welfare Fund

According to a document titled "instructions for the sale of emergency materials in the Asset Management Department of XX Aviation Co. , Ltd. , " these masks were handed over by the Ministry of aircraft to apply for the Wuhan Coronavirus epidemic period, group of social workers to apply for purchasing company surplus stock masks. The mask is a 3m medical protective mask, the document is provided with the time and number of the winning bid, and the airline seal.

"The bid they won was $16, and half the price was equivalent to $8, " the secretary-general said. The purchase price for this lot is 560,000. "We subconsciously thought that the supplies the airline had in reserve must be up to standard, " he said. More to the heart of the foundation was a promise that the masks would be flown directly to Wuhan by the airline.

"Not to be used for profit, all transportation costs incurred by the company to bear, " they wrote in the document.

A contract for the sale of goods and materials provided by a fraudster for drawing / interview with a Public Welfare Fund

With the benefit of hindsight, there were several discrepancies in the document. First, they provide the contract title, the name of the airline wrote a word wrong; second, in the body of the contract, they put a party b many times misuse; third, the other party left the mailbox can not receive mail after testing.

In order to strengthen the trust, the fraudster specially provides materials for sale below the instructions, printed with "cc: XX Chairman, XX general manager, XX General Accountant, the Administrative Management Department, the Board of Directors Office, " the words, these are the real names of the airline executives. In general, cc only appears in the email, not the text, which is a bit of a giveaway, but in the context of Minute to Win It support, the organizers didn't think much of it.

"If you just put a deposit of one hundred thousand, you can take all the goods, " the secretary-general said eagerly. "They are airlifting them directly to Wuhan. How wonderful! Let's talk quickly. ".

Until the last minute, the foundation's legal counsel found that the beneficiary was not the airline. They looked up the company, which was written off in mid-2019. That's when the head of the foundation started to sound the alarm. He also learned from other sources that the team was making simultaneous offers to other charities and asking them to pay a down payment.

According to the secretary-general, the scammers first targeted the foreign student population, who had been active in supporting the front line, but then, perhaps unable to consume supplies, they targeted the foundation. So far, the foundation has filed a report.

As of the evening of the 25th, the foundation is waiting for delivery news release of the press release, did not expect the accident. "No, I couldn't confirm that he was a liar until late at night, " the secretary-general said, "I can tolerate any price increase. At the most, I don't choose it, but obviously it's a terrible scam, " he said, hoping to draw attention to the case from other public interest groups and people. Don't encourage the bad guys with the goodwill of others.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
Wake up, 200,000 masks gone

Rojan (not his real name) works for a charitable foundation. On this day, he had just ordered 200,000 masks. When he went to bed at 2 am, he always felt uneasy. He woke up at 4 am to open his mobile phone, only to find that the factory had temporarily sent out a notice on Wechat: "The masks have been withheld by the relevant departments and are not allowed to be sold. " Only two hours later, a large quantity of supplies went up in smoke.

These masks are disposable medical masks, each 1 yuan, the current model of masks in the normal price fluctuations between 60 cents to 1.5. He suspected that the goods had been sold to others at a higher price, but he could not be sure. "Tens of thousands of them have been intercepted, some even paid for, " said a founder of a non-governmental organization involved in Chi-yuan. They had just ordered tens of thousands of masks from a manufacturer in Taizhou, but the last-minute notice was cancelled.

It's a common feeling that purchasing is getting harder. "prices have gone up by 100 percent or 200 percent as we've been collecting, " said Xi Wei, the CEO of a start-up company that mobilized its resources two days before the Lunar New Year, one of them had agreed to buy N95 masks for $5, then turned it into $13 after half an hour. The purchase price of this type of mask is between 5 yuan and 15 yuan, and they have purchased over 200,000 masks.

According to Rojan, the basic N95 mask is now bought, there is a gap between the real medical standards, pure medical masks because there is no source of supply they have been close to giving up, can only hope that the government agencies unified deployment. N95 LEVEL MASK general purchase price is 7-8 yuan, the fluctuation high point is 11-12 yuan, now reached 16 yuan is also a reasonable range. But someone has been selling the mask for 25-35 yuan at a markup. "The markup is quite exaggerated, I dare not say to you. " And the disposable medical mask normal price is 7-80 cents, now the expensive sell each 2.5 yuan.

The above-mentioned Public Welfare Fund secretary-general said that there is not much bargaining on the market, the basic is a bargain, merchants do not worry about selling, as long as the goods, "seconds. ". In the past, as long as the Public Welfare Fund to do the project, as long as a good plan, in advance to tell suppliers how much it needs, and this is "in the rush to buy, it depends on who is fast. ".

The State Administration of Market Supervision and administration issued a notice on Jan. 25, calling for more regulation of the market prices of face masks, disinfection and sterilization supplies, antiviral drugs and related medical devices. "The state certainly controls it, but it is human nature, and there is nothing we can do about it, " the secretary-general said. "We can not judge human nature. "

She says they have not been able to find any in the market since the 26th. They contacted a number of mask makers, and even if they did, the price would be quite high -- $30 for a grade 95 mask. On another occasion, they bought disposable surgical masks, arrived at 1:00 a.m. on New Year's Eve, and together they removed more than 50 boxes of masks. Did Not expect this batch of 2 yuan per poor quality masks, and manufacturers to show them the real object is completely different, they immediately decided to return. The other side dismissively said, you don't want a lot of people to rush to, in the subway station can sell three times the price, he sold that day of half a million.

She xiwei bought a low-quality mask and decided to return it.

"We don't want to give them this kind of national calamity and this kind of behavior certainly can't indulge them, " said another internet industry source involved in the campaign, they filter out the supply at outrageous prices and purchase only goods within 10 yuan.

Masks are in short supply, not to mention protective clothing. "I basically haven't bought one yet, " she said. Rojan also made it clear that it was difficult to find truly standard suits on the market, that there were very few manufacturers, and that charities had not been approached before, "and frankly I was afraid to buy them. ". He managed to find a batch of 5,000-scale protective clothing, wearing only a hat without shoes, selling for more than 30 yuan a set. But because the protective clothing is an export commodity, and from the raw material manufacturers, not secondary processing, simply can not enter the hospital. They sought a compromise -- to send it to the sanitation workers. At present, the procurement of protective clothing can only rely on a stronger channel capacity of large funds, large institutions.

In the chaos, someone even pretended to be a hospital to intercept supplies. "the attention that donates, has hits our courtyard sign to intercept the goods and materials. " A medical worker sends out the call in the rescue group. The hospital in Xiwei, she, also received a strange call asking for logistics information: "I'm really worried about life-saving materials being claimed. "

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
WHO's GONNA distribute it?

After the outbreak, Wuhan's new pneumonia control and Prevention Command said they needed to coordinate all supplies. Most charities now contact the local Red Cross or charity federation to ask if they need the supplies and to tell them which hospital to send them to. But some civil society groups prefer to target hospitals and doctors, arguing that official agencies may primarily support head hospitals, while others outside the public eye are more at risk.

For example, a special hospital in Wuhan does not have a fever clinic or a designated hospital, but more than a dozen doctors have been infected and are not known to outsiders, said the NGO's founder. They want to supply the front-line doctors directly, to supplement supplies that are skewed away from the official organization.

Through their own channels from the domestic, South Korea, Japan, India and other places to collect goggle-based materials, the information sent to the hospital procurement department to see if the need. The other side feedback, some materials if the hospital's own procurement channels are not up to standard, but the status quo is "some hospitals have nothing, even take plastic bags as protective clothing" , "some is good" , so urgent donations.

"The biggest problem right now is not just the lack of supplies, but the problem of distribution and distribution in the middle. " The people concerned that the Red Cross, which supports hospitals and doctors through peer-to-peer support, has accumulated too many supplies, leading to inefficient distribution, could more efficiently fill some of the current shortages. So the idea is to help hospitals in dire need of supplies to relieve short-term pressure for three or four days until supplies from official channels reach them.

There is a contradiction between the need for official bodies such as the Wuhan Red Cross to co ordinate supplies, and the desire of some civil society groups for peer to peer support. The difference in thinking about the rescue puts them at odds. For example, the above-mentioned people first transported goods to Wuhan via China Railway Express, and then were driven to designated hospitals by Wuhan enthusiasts, but the line was cut off. Debon says he can deliver goods for free, but there are restrictions on weight, corporate identity, and so on. So it had to go through SF express.

"Now this road may be blocked, " he said in an interview on the 27th, "We are also very helpless now. We have struggled to find a lot of goods, but they can not be delivered. Doctors at the hospital have all been contacted, but they can not be delivered. " He heard that supplies from similar groups had been airlifted to Wuhan and were intercepted by the Red Cross, to be collected and distributed uniformly. And their own on the road several batches of goods, delay no movement, "let the hospital to urge Shun Feng, the phone is also not connected. ".

They raised 200,000 yuan in the early stage, and then they were chased by people who wanted to invest millions of dollars. Now money is not a problem, procurement can also try to solve, for fear that the transport link is not open, so they refused to more well-intentioned capital. He felt "furtive, like a thief. ". The good news, however, after a few anxious days, is that their shipment has finally arrived.

A senior personage of Public Welfare Fund thinks, at present this kind of situation achieves the highest efficiency necessarily to need the country to coordinate, the professional matter hands over to the professional person to do, otherwise may cause everybody cavity enthusiasm to buy the mask, getting him to a hospital won't help. Core hospitals and health care workers are certainly a national priority, and civilian efforts can be replenished based on time-sensitive concerns, such as communities. Don't worry about who's buying how many N95s and who's buying how many surgical masks. At the critical moment, both official and non-governmental forces should form a synergy.

On January 29, the governor of Hubei Province, Xiaodong Wang, announced that as of 12:00 on the same day, the Hubei Provincial Charity System, the Red Cross system, the total amount of charity received 4.26 billion yuan, 5.29 million items of charity.

In the face of disaster, there are people who cheat, pretend to be an airline, almost cheat one hundred thousand people; there are people who charge outrageous prices and take advantage of it; and of course, there are also people and organizations with warm blood who provide emergency support to the affected areas, but they face a certain amount of communication resistance.

Here, the goodness and the darkness of human nature erupt together, and in the complex functioning of society, the good and the good may also cross a silent barrier. We must not encourage evil, and official institutions and civil society organizations should establish better communication mechanisms to reduce unnecessary suspicion and friction in the flow of good ideas.
